data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: I am going to take a Mandarin class at university this fall. I ____ to ____ a ____ for ____. I ____ excited ____ my ____. I ____ to ____ to China one ____. I will have to study Mandarin for many years, but I am happy to work hard.
data.partBlankContent: I am going to take a Mandarin class at university this fall. I ne__ to b__ a dicti_____ for cl___. I a_ excited ab___ my cl___. I wa__ to tra___ to China one d__. I will have to study Mandarin for many years, but I am happy to work hard.
data.answer: 今年秋天我要去大学上普通话课。我需要买一本字典上课用。我对我的课感到兴奋。我想有一天去中国旅游。我要学习普通话很多年，但我很高兴努力学习。
